file_content.text: You must stop this nonsense now.
Don't let him talk to you like that!
He's a treacherous snake. Cut out his fangs!
Careful now. Don't lose control.
I warned you my ritual was dangerous. I warned you it was not for the weak. But you drank the poison!
Rolan, out of my way! Run him through before he ex--
Rolan, out of my way! Run her through before she ex--
What just happened? Where's Thanaton?
You're dying, little snake. Don't struggle. It'll only prolong the agony.
One thing I forgot to mention about the Force binding: you should never, ever bind more than one ghost at a time. Or else, well, you'll see.
I command you to leave.
Get out of my head.
We thought you might say that. But we'd rather not.
Whoever you are, be quiet. I need to think.
Shut up!
She wants to think! She should have thought before she grasped for power beyond her abilities!
He wants to think! He should have thought before he grasped for power beyond his abilities!
I'm still not sure I understand. I was fighting Thanaton....
How did this happen?
Too much exertion. Wears you out. Lowers your defenses.
We had no choice but to serve you before. But now, we can finally have some fun.
Sith! Back in the land of the living. Easy now.
You overextended yourself. The ghosts' power was too much for your body to adapt to so quickly.
And that's not to mention the little chats you've been having in your sleep. Let me guess, the ghosts?
They won't be quiet. How did you know?
Lucky guess.
I know a thing or two about voices invading one's thoughts.
Watch where you pry.
Deny it outright next time. Evasion is as good as confirmation.
Actually, I was having this amazing dream. There were these relics, and each of them produced a different flavor of ice cream.
I was just sleeping.
Hmm. I never get the good dreams. It's always flesh-eating Jawas or Hutts in bikinis.
Hutts in bikinis? Sounds like an improvement.
Either way, you were having a lively conversation.
Whatever the cause, you look dire. And Thanaton will take advantage unless we find a cure quickly.
Whatever it was, we gotta put you back together before Thanaton realizes he's not the only one to survive that blast.
Give me some time to do some research. Ashara--I'll need your help. Holocrons are impossible these days.
Let me have a look at some writings. I'll get back to you....
This is beyond my expertise. Give me some time to do some research. Ashara--I'll need your help. Holocrons are impossible these days.
Give me some time to do some research.
Sith, we're getting a call in here. Looks important.
Best answer it. This may take some time.
That was quick thinking, buying off Lord Cineratus.
You'll be pleased to know the hedonist has already gambled it all away.
Man served me well for thirteen years until you bought him. Playing on a fellow Sith's pleasures--clever move.
Some might view it as shrinking from a fight, especially after he killed your apprentices. But you're no coward.
After Lord Cineratus's death, I knew you'd be here eventually.
A lesser Sith would run and hide under a sand dune. But it's obvious you're not a lesser Sith.
Your persistence is reckless, foolish, insulting. You mock the Sith order by pretending you are worthy of facing me.
Draw your lightsaber. You die here.
Prepare to fight.
I've faced many challenges over the years. My death is no more certain now than it was then.
Stop babbling.
Talk makes you impatient?
I don't want to kill you.
I suppose you could flee, leave the Sith order behind, find a lover, settle down, start a farm in some backwater planet.
But you would always be the one who fled, and I would always be the one who let you get away.
It would eat at us. Always wondering who would have won. Rolan?
It is the law of the Sith and the law is inviolable.
You are young and proud. No doubt all you see is a withered old man waiting to be crushed and succeeded. Rolan?
Yes, master.
The apprentice of a disobedient Sith must die. Let us do our solemn duty.
This time I will be sure to dispose of your corpse personally.
I will not be a corpse.
Not a chance.
I've learned a few tricks since we last met.
Watch this.
I didn't want it to end like this.
I'm sorry.
Mmmph. What have you done? You fool. You can't handle that kind of power!
